reviewText: Jack Frost 2 wsa the reason I bought this, but I chose this edition because it included a Robert Englund flick, too; Jack Frost 2 is just as much fun, silly and offensive as the original (a shame they couldn't have created a new character for Shannon Elizabeth to return, though: 3 points; Killer Tongue is dull, slow and too college arty for me, and homo-erotica just doesn't appeal to me...so sorry, Charlie: 0 points.
